# `JourneyViewChartGroupByAttribute` Definition

A journey element attribute to group by within the chart

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| elementId | `string` | Yes | The element in the list of elements which is being grouped by |
| attribute | `string` | Yes | The attribute of the element being grouped by |
